ModMetaData.name: Cosmic Horrors VGP Meal Patch
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Adds strange versions of all Vegetable Garden Project-meals.
General â€¢ Add these recipes/meals: Pemmican, Packaged Survival Meal, Stir-Fry, Stew, Pizza, Salted Meat, Cheeseburger, Tacos, Meat Pie, Kabobs, Grilled Steak â€¢ Has added texture on the original textures to indicate strange-version. â€¢ Stats and nutritions are the same as the original meals. â€¢ Adds a Strange meal category for sorting.
Compatibilities â€¢ Compatible with existent saves and other mods. â€¢ Requires Vegetable Garden, VG Gourmet and of course Cosmic Horrors
